â˜• Team

Our trainers have experience as software engineers, data scientists and AI engineers within industry, working to build deep learning systems for clients. We bring that experience, together with strong learning and teaching skills to present workshops in and intuitive, hands-on, collaborative and practical way.

GitHub | LinkedIn | Blog

Noon van der Silk is the director of Braneshop and lead trainer. Noon has almost 18+ years experience in various forms of software engineering, working to design and implement a variety of applications, with a recent focus, in the last few years, on machine learning (ML) and AI systems, in the field of computer vision, and interactive art.

Noon has a research background, obtaining a Masters in Pure Mathematics, with a focus on quantum computing.

Noon is particularly passionate about empowering people by through skill development.

Through out partnership with Silverpond we also bring deep-learning practioners from the fires of consulting to the workshop, so we're as up-to-date as possible!

Braneshop is located on the traditional lands of the Wurundjeri people of the Kulin nation and the Gadigal people of the Eora nation. We acknowledge that sovereignty was never ceded and pay our respects to elders past, present and emerging.
